Anthony Lamar King (born 22 January 1985) is an American-born, naturalised Cypriot professional basketball player for Apollon Limassol of the Cypriot League. He played college basketball at Miami.
He represented Cyprus' national basketball team at the EuroBasket 2017 qualification, where he was his team's best rebounder and shot blocker.
